title.rendered: Air Niugini in Sydney NSW, Australia

content.rendered:
Air Niugini Limited is the national airline of Papua New Guinea, based in Air Niugini House on the property of Jacksons International Airport, Port Moresby. It was founded in 1973. It operates a domestic network from Port Moresby and Lae, as well as international services in Asia, Oceania, and Australia. Its main base is Jacksons International Airport. Niugini is the Tok Pisin word for New Guinea.

Air Niugini Sydney NSW, Australia Address:
Level 3 / 100 Clarence Street
Sydney, NSW Australia

Phone:
1300 361 380 (Toll Free)
+61 2 9290 1544

Email: sales.syd@airniugini.com.pg

Fax: 61 2 9299 3483

Air Niugini Official website: http://www.airniugini.com.pg/

Air Niugini Online Check-in: www.Air Niugini.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note:Check in online between twenty four (24) hours to three (3) hours before departure.

Check Air Niugini schedule here: www.Air Niugini.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Niugini flight status here: www.Air Niugini.com/in/gb/flight status

Air Niugini Baggage Allowance

Air Niugini Baggage

View Air Niugini Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage charges in the above link.

Fax: +675 327 3663

1300 361 380 (Australia)

Fax: +675 327 3396

For any special assistance, contact special handling desk team

Air Niugini Airline Doctors

Port Moresby Medical Service Phone: (+675) 325 6633

Email: portmoresbymedicalservice@gmail.com

Air Niugini Clinic Phone Number: (+675) 327 3510

Email: medical.officer@airniugini.com.pg

Dr Athithan Chelvanathan| Dr John Tablizo | Dr Ferdinand Esguerra
